Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
Why does the billing verification costs 10$

The $10 charge is a temporary card authorization fee. If you run ads, this amount goes towards your advertising budget. If you don't run ads, it will be fully refunded. This is a standard procedure to verify the payment method on file.
it says Payment failed. Please check your payment method in Billing although i verify my card

If your card payment failed even though you have verified it and have enough funds, I recommend contacting your bank to resolve the payment issue. Alternatively, you can add a different payment method. If you choose to update your account with a different payment method, don't forget to resubmit your ads! Another short-term solution is to add ad credits to your account.
when do i get my money back if i run no ads

If you don't run any ads, the $10 temporary authorization fee will be fully refunded. The payment amount is held for 7 days, and if not captured within this time, Stripe cancels the payment and releases the funds back to you.
